about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Delhi-based Suich Industries Limited was previously known as Delhi Fone N Batteries Pvt Ltd. It is engaged in assembling and marketing of feature & smart phones, batteries, chargers, power bank, LED TV and smart TV under the Suich brand name.

The company imports the equipment and assembling parts from China. It has a manufacturing unit at State Infrastructure and Industrial Development Corporation of Uttarakhand Limited (SIIDCUL) in Haridwar where it assembles the products.

Recently, the company has also entered into exports business for its products. Suich Industries Limited is also involved in the trading activity of finished products between manufacturers and distributors on-demand basis. Blue Wave Trading H.K. Ltd is the wholly owned subsidiary of the company to procure the raw materials. The company has also set up a Research & Development Centre (R&D) focusing on the expansion of the product portfolio.

The competitive strength of the company are:
1. Wide product range
2. Cost-effective procurement
3. Catering to rural areas
4. Pocket-friendly products

faqs.question: What is the Suich Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Suich Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 4115200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹30.86 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹75 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on May 30, 2019, and closes on June 4, 2019.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Suich Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Suich Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Suich Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Suich Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Suich Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Suich Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Suich Industries IPO opens on May 30, 2019 and closes on June 4, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Suich Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Suich Industries IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Suich Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Suich Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Suich Industries IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Suich Industries IPO will be done on Monday, June 10, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, June 12, 2019. Check the Suich Industries IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Suich Industries IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Suich Industries IPO listing date is on Thursday, June 13, 2019.
